scripts.install: concurrently "cd ff-log && npm install --no-optional " "cd lme-data-api && npm install --no-optional " "cd ff-fes-xlsx && npm install --no-optional " "cd ff-fes && npm install --no-optional " "cd lme-model-api && npm install --no-optional" "cd ff-formulajs && npm install --no-optional" "cd demo-apps && npm install --no-optional" "cd ff-ssh-git && npm install --no-optional" "cd ff-math && npm install --no-optional" "cd lme-model-tests && npm install --no-optional"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd ff-fes-xlsx && npm test" "cd ff-fes && npm test" "cd model-tests && npm test" "cd lme-model-api && npm test" "cd ff-log && npm test"
